Summon_Portal.display_help: Black Swan summons portals to Shadow Earth, allowing nether energies to permeate the area. Note that Summon Portal is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Nether_Vortex.display_help: Black Swan summons portals to Shadow Earth, allowing nether energies to permeate the area. Note that Nether Vortex is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Mistress_of_Shadows.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

Umbral_Embrace.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
Black Swan feeds off of the Nether energies attached to you, healing her!

Maw_of_Despair.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Quills_of_Jocas.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Note that Quills of Jocas is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Quills_of_Jocas.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.
Quills_of_Jocas.display_attacker_attack_floater: The Quills of Jocas siphon Incarnate power!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Fling your quills all around you and impale {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of lethal damage!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} impales you with the {PowerName} for {Damage} points of lethal damage!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Throw_Quills.display_help: You can throw dozens of Spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Spine throwing deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Note that Throw Quills is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
{PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} disables your incarnate powers!

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworld and Smite your foe with a powerful blow. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High. Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High. Recharge: Moderate
Life_Drain.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
You gain {Damage} hit points from your {PowerName}!

Shadowy_Binds.display_help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Shadowy_Binds.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Shadowy_Binds.display_target_help: You have been entangled by Shadowy Binds and have been left immobilized.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Dark_Grasp.display_help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering from moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Dark_Grasp.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Dark_Grasp.display_target_help: The Penumbral Grasp has stopped you in your tracks!

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Living_Shadows.display_help: You extend and animate your own shadow causing it to entangle all foes within a long cone pattern in front of you, rendering all affected foes immobilized. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Living_Shadows.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Living_Shadows.display_target_help: The Living Shadows are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Heart_of_Darkness.display_help: In a burst of negative energy you overwhelm the minds of those around you causing them to be disoriented and suffer minor negative energy damage over a short time. Affected targets will also have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Minor (DoT), Recharge: Long
Heart_of_Darkness.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Disorient, -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
{PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.
